amendment.description: To provide for consideration of additional factors in indecency penalties.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3457 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3457 proposed by Senator Burns to Amendment SA 3235. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6981-6984; text: CR 6/18/2004 S6981) To provide for consideration of additional factors in indecency penalties.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3457 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3457 proposed by Senator Burns to Amendment SA 3235.
